transbit.tbits.rules
Class RulesManager

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.rules.RulesManager

public class RulesManager
extends java.lang.Object

The manager for all the java rules stored in the database. Keeps maps of all the rule classes and the classbytes corresponding to each rule. Every new rule needs to be added to this manager in order to be implemented. The rule manager can be called to return all the rules implementing any particular interface.

Author:
karan
